publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2315 Jamie Hepburn: Antonine Wallâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the decision by UNESCO to award the Antonine Wall world heritage status, recognising it as an important historical link between Scotland and the Roman Empire, and further welcomes the boost to tourism and the local economies of those areas along the route of the Antonine Wall that this award represents.

S3M-2315 Antonine Wall (lodged on 8 July 2008) Christopher Harvie*, Mike Pringle*, Stuart McMillan*, Ken Macintosh*, Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Christina McKelvie*, Brian Adam*, Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Keith Brown*, Robin Harper*, Angela Constance*, Bashir Ahmad*, Rob Gibson*, Cathy Peattie*
S3M-2315 Antonine Wall (lodged on 8 July 2008) Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-2315 Antonine Wall (lodged on 8 July 2008) Dave Thompson*, Gil Paterson*
